me.coley.addressbook.service

Interface ContactService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElasticContactService

    public interface ContactService
    Contact functionality outline.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a contact.
      Collection<Contact> contacts(int page, int length, String query)
      Return a selection of existing contents.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Contact contact)
  throws DuplicateContactException
        Add a contact.
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact to add.
        Throws:
        DuplicateContactException - When a contact with the same identifier as the given one already exists.

      • delete

        void delete(String name)
     throws MissingContactException
        Delete an existing contact.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of contact to remove.
        Throws:
        MissingContactException - When no contact by the given name could be found.

      • exists

        boolean exists(String name)
        Check if a contact exists by looking up their identifier.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of contact to lookup.
        Returns:
        true when the contact is found. false otherwise.

      • contacts

        Collection<Contact> contacts(int page,
                             int length,
                             String query)
        Return a selection of existing contents.
        Parameters:
        page - Page number to pull from. The index is 1-based.
        length - Number of contacts to display per page.
        query - String query.
        Returns:
        Contacts on the page.

      • update

        Contact update(Contact contact)
        throws MissingContactException
        Update an existing content by providing a model of the new contact information.
        Parameters:
        contact - A minimal contact that will have its information copied to the existing contact by the same identifier.
        Returns:
        Old contact.
        Throws:
        MissingContactException - When no matching contact by the given minimal contact's identifier can be found.

      • get

        Contact get(String name)
     throws MissingContactException
        Fetch a contact by their unique name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of contact to fetch.
        Returns:
        Contact information.
        Throws:
        MissingContactException - When no contact by the given name could be found.
